wallets.name: Hovi Wallet
wallets.description: Hovi Wallet is a privacy preserving digital identity wallet that supports W3C Verifiable Credentials and decentralized identifiers (DIDs) for secure issuance, storage, and presentation of credentials. It enables selective disclosure and zero knowledge proof based verification, allowing relying parties to validate claims without accessing raw personal data. The wallet uses cryptographic key management on device, supports standards aligned with EUDI wallet requirements, and interoperates with cross border trust frameworks. Credentials are presented using secure, standards based protocols, ensuring integrity, authenticity, and user controlled consent across authentication and authorization flows.

wallets.name: Hovi Business Wallet
wallets.description: Hovi Business Wallet is an enterprise grade organizational wallet designed for issuing, holding, and verifying verifiable credentials at scale. It enables businesses to manage decentralized identifiers, cryptographic keys, and credential lifecycles for employees, partners, devices, and automated agents. The wallet supports W3C Verifiable Credentials, policy based verification, selective disclosure, and zero knowledge proof flows, and integrates via APIs and webhooks into existing identity, compliance, and business systems. Built to align with eIDAS 2.0 and EUDI wallet ecosystems, Hovi Business Wallet provides auditable, secure, and interoperable digital trust infrastructure for cross border and regulated use cases.
